name: SokoBroko
description:
Controls:

  • WASD / arrows to move
  • X to undo
  • R to Restart Level

Sokoban inspired game about pushing glitchy boxes.

5 puzzle levels in total, the final gets perhaps too hard as i collapsed another level into it for time. Each level aims to teach you something new.

Please give honest feedback, enjoy :D. Recommend Full-screen.

Sounds made by bfxr = awesome and useful.
